question1: What is your Minecraft username? (Make sure that all caps are correct and that there are no typo's)
question2: What is your Discord tag? (For example: **SkyblockSquad Bot#3596**)
question3: For how long have you been in the guild? (If you don't know, we can check)
question4: Why would you like to join the staff team?
question5: How could you help our staff team?
question6: Why should we choose you above the other applicants?
question7: How many hours are online a day on average? (Doesn't have to be every single day, but most of the time)
question8: How much guild experience do you get a day on average? (Doesn't have to be every single day, but most of the time, you can check using **/guild top**)
question9: Anything else you want to tell us? (Say **no** if you don't)
